Company Overview.Name: Mysore Petro Chemicals Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Incorporated in 1969, Mysore Petro Chemicals Ltd is engaged in trading of Phthalic Anhydride, Maleic Anhydride and other chemicals.  Company used to manufacture Phthalic Anhydride (PA) at its plant at Raichur in Karnataka with a capacity of 12000 MTPA. However, due to economic unviability, the Plant was closed from July 2013 till April 2017. Company has transferred its MA business by way of “Slump Sale” to I G Petrochemicals Limited and is now involved in trading of organic & inorganic chemicals.
